catalogue.title: Simulated COVID-19 Remdesivir Study (TEST)
catalogue.description: Cohorts simulated from distributions reported originally in a randomised controlled trial of Remdesivir on COVID-19 patients by the ACTT-1 Study Group (doi: 10.1056/NEJMoa2007764). The original distributions in the study cohort are supplemented by variations in fictional cohorts. This dataset was developed in order to support meta-analysis efforts by the COVID-19 Workbench
catalogue.creator: Aridhia Example

dictionaries.name: Simulated Covid19 Remdesivir
dictionaries.description: A table describing patients given Remdesivir

fields.name: study_name
fields.label: Study Name
fields.description: Fictional name of the cohort study, or ACTT-1 Study for the cohort based on the original distribution.

fields.name: randomization
fields.label: Randomization
fields.description: How the participant was assigned to an arm in the trial

fields.name: subgroup
fields.label: Treatment subgroup
fields.description: What specific additional treatment was administered

fields.name: recovered_d15
fields.label: Recovered at Day 15
fields.description: Whether the participant recovered by Day 15

options.name: Placebo

Not hospitalized, no limitations on activities (1)
Not hospitalized, limitation on activities and/or requiring home oxygen (2)
Hospitalized, not requiring supplemental oxygen - no longer requires ongoing medical care (3)
Hospitalized, not requiring supplemental oxygen - requiring ongoing medical care (COVID-19 related or otherwise) (4)
Hospitalized, requiring supplemental oxygen (5)
Hospitalized, on non-invasive ventilation or high flow oxygen devices (6)
Hospitalized, on invasive mechanical ventilation or ECMO (7)
Death (8)
